We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ChandeMomentumOscillator _cmo;
// In Initialize()
_cmo = CMO(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_cmo.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMO Period", _cmo.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMO Current", _cmo.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.cmo = self.CMO(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.cmo.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMO Period", self.cmo.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMO Current", self.cmo.Current);
